proposals.utils.validate_proposal module¶

This file contains code for validating a proposal by using all the relevant forms and their validation code.

Used for the submit page, to check if a user has completed the proposal.

proposals.utils.validate_proposal.get_form_errors(proposal: proposals.models.Proposal) → list[source]¶
